summary: This mod REQUIRES Hearthfire and the latest version of Skyrim. This mod remakes the interior of breezehome with the intent of using the Hearthfire DlC while remaining lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/d2e87a4c8f808f2acfcd66ff4a0ce8b4/tumblr_o8xlfkJPGu1raiwpfo3_1280.png[/img]

                                       They'll be a million different player homes and breezehome mods so I see no point 

[size=2]This mod is not going to be ported, so if you see this mod anywhere other than here or My Steam workshop, please message Me and report the stolen mod![/size]







This mod [b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=3]REQUIRES[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b] Hearthfire [color=#ff0000][size=2][i][u]and[/u][/i] [/size][/color]the latest version of Skyrim!!!

This mod remakes the interior of breezehome with the intent of using the Hearthfire DLC while remaining lore-friendly.

The mod re-adds the alchemy lab that is removed when you have the children's bedroom and gives the house a over all more "hunter-warrior" and [i]lived-in [/i]look, something you can see an adventurer living in, as well as adding a more storage space.

[size=5][u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u][/size]

- [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/220760/]Hearthfire DLC[/url]
- Latest version of Skyrim(I.e. the last patch)

Now this part is [b][i][color=#ff0000][size=4][u]Very important[/u] [/size][/color][size=2]kids, so listen up![/size][/i][/b]

In order for you to use this mod right, you [b][u][i]must[/i][/u][/b] have Breezehome [size=3][u][i]already fully upgraded[/i] [b][i]with[/i][/b][/u][/size] the children's bedroom! Otherwise you [b][i][u]will [/u][/i][/b]run into bugs! I also strongly advise that you remove everything you want out of the house before activating the mod, since many things things are moved around, removed or added.


[size=5][u][b]This Mod Adds:[/b][/u][/size]


- A lore-friendly remake of the interior of breezehome giving it a more "lived in", hunter-warrior look.
- Re-adds a alchemy lab and places it by the door where that useless table was
- More storage space!
- A shrine.
- Small edit to the upstairs hallway.
- Small edit to Lydia's room.
- Small edit to the master bedroom.
- Moves around and removes a few things.
- More, better decorations.
- A uniquely named set of Wolf Armor.
- A bee in a jar.

[b][u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Updates:[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b]Update I(Ver 2.0, 7/14/14)[/b][/size][/color]

- Small aesthetic edits in the house.
- Added a renamed Strongbox called Jewelry box to the master bedroom.
- Added a safe to the master bedroom.
- Added a mammoth Skull to the upstairs hallway.
- Moved Lydia's bed a bit so it was no longer clipping into the wall(this is something Hearthfire caused.).
- Replaced the bench in the upstairs hallway to a Dwemer bench.
- Added a small juniper Berry bush on the alchemy station(or as Ralof calls them, Juntenurburburries).


[size=5][u][b]Install:[/b][/u][/size]

-Simply place the esp in your Skyrim/data folder and launch the launcher and check it.


[size=5][u][b]Un-Install:[/b][/u][/size]

- Simply uncheck the esp in the launcher and then delete the esp in the data folder.


[size=5][u][b]Compatibility:[/b][/u][/size]

- Any mod that changes Breezehome will almost certainly conflict.


[size=5][u][b]Bugs:[/b][/u][/size]

- [i][color=#00ff00]None[/color][/i]. This mod has been bug tested and cleaned with TES5Edit.

[u][b]Recommended Mods:[/b][/u]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]([i][color=#ff0000]Strongly recommended[/color][/i])
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25127/?]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch[/url]([i][color=#ff0000]Strongly recommended[/color][/i])
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12110/?]Beautiful Whiterun[/url] [size=3][i]or[/i][/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Whiterun Overhaul[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]

[size=5][b][u]Tools Used:[/u][/b][/size]

- The Creation Kit
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]
[size=5][b][u]
[/u][/b][/size][u][b][size=5]Permissions:[/size][/b][/u]

- [b][i][size=4]You do not have permission to reupload to here, the Nexus, or anywhere without My explicit permission, if you want to use this in a compilation pack, ask Me first as well.[/size][/i][/b]




[u][b][size=5]Credits:[/size][/b][/u]

- Me, for wasting too much time on this..
- Bethesda Softworks(for making the game)
- Xbone/PS4 Console Sticker is by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/25912980/?]yevvie[/url]


[size=5][b][u]Finale Note: [/u][/b][/size]


- This mod uses only vanilla assets found in the Skyrim BSAs.
- If you have any questions, feel free to send Me a message on here the Nexus or on Tumblr(I am on there everyday) 

[size=3][url=http://fallenfromfirmament.tumblr.com/]My Tumblr[/url][/size]

- [size=4][i]Again, Hearthfire and the latest version of Skyrim is required![/i][/size]

I really hope you enjoy My mod! Have fun. :)
author: LordGermanicus666
